name: Diabetes Type 2
description: A metabolic disease characterized by high blood sugar levels over a prolonged period

name: Hypertension
description: Persistently elevated blood pressure in the arteries

name: Heart Disease
description: Conditions affecting the heart structure and function including coronary artery disease

name: Influenza
description: Viral infection affecting the respiratory system caused by influenza viruses

name: Common Cold
description: Viral infectious disease of the upper respiratory tract

name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
description: Chronic inflammatory disorder affecting joints and surrounding tissues

name: Osteoarthritis
description: Degenerative joint disease caused by breakdown of joint cartilage

name: Migraine
description: Recurring headaches causing moderate to severe throbbing pain

name: Tension Headache
description: Most common type of headache characterized by mild to moderate pain

name: Allergic Rhinitis
description: Inflammation of nasal passages caused by allergens

name: Asthma
description: Chronic respiratory condition causing breathing difficulties

name: Hypothyroidism
description: Underactive thyroid gland not producing enough hormones

name: Hyperthyroidism
description: Overactive thyroid gland producing excess hormones

name: Iron Deficiency Anemia
description: Condition with insufficient red blood cells due to low iron

name: Vitamin B12 Deficiency
description: Anemia caused by lack of vitamin B12

name: Gastroesophageal Reflux
description: Digestive disorder where stomach acid flows back into esophagus

name: Peptic Ulcer
description: Sores developing on the lining of stomach or small intestine

name: Urinary Tract Infection
description: Infection in any part of the urinary system

name: Bronchitis
description: Inflammation of the bronchial tubes carrying air to lungs

name: Pneumonia
description: Infection causing inflammation in air sacs of lungs

name: Depression
description: Mental health disorder characterized by persistent sadness

name: Anxiety Disorder
description: Mental health condition characterized by excessive worry

name: Insomnia
description: Sleep disorder characterized by difficulty falling or staying asleep

name: Obesity
description: Excess body fat accumulation posing health risks

name: Healthy
description: No significant health issues detected
